glsa.title: MLDonkey: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in the MLDonkey web interface allows remote attackers to disclose arbitrary files.

background.p: MLDonkey is a multi-network P2P application written in Ocaml, coming with its own Gtk GUI, web and telnet interface.

description.p: Michael Peselnik reported that src/utils/lib/url.ml in the web interface of MLDonkey does not handle file names with leading double slashes properly.

impact.p: A remote attacker could gain access to arbitrary files readable by the user running the application.

workaround.p: Disable the web interface or restrict access to it.
